message: This is a rare opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $2000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a 50% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you because I value our relationship. If you don't take this chance, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price. What do you say? Will you take the deal?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.
